milestones.title: v1.0.0 - Architecture & Core Development
milestones.description: Initial architecture design and core contract development including ShareVault, VaultCore, and SwapContract

milestones.title: v1.1.0 - LST Integration
milestones.description: Integration of 4 LST protocols (wKoKAIA, wGCKAIA, wstKLAY, stKAIA) with unified handling

milestones.title: v1.2.0 - Testing & Optimization
milestones.description: Comprehensive testing suite, gas optimization, and critical bug fixes

milestones.title: v1.3.0 - ClaimManager & Unstaking
milestones.description: Implementation of ClaimManager for unstake/claim operations with 7-day waiting period

milestones.title: v1.4.0 - Documentation & Organization
milestones.description: Complete documentation, script organization, and developer guides

issues.title: Test Unstake/Claim functionality for all LST protocols
issues.body:
- Test unstake for wKoKAIA, wGCKAIA, wstKLAY, stKAIA
- Verify 7-day waiting period enforcement
- Test claim execution after waiting period
- Test batch claim functionality
- Verify ClaimManager delegatecall integration

issues.title: Fix intermittent WETH error during WKAIA deposits
issues.body:
- Intermittent 'WETH' error during WKAIA deposits
- Occurs sporadically, not consistently reproducible
- May be related to WKAIA/WETH interface confusion
- Check IWETH9 interface usage in contracts
- Implement permanent fix and add regression tests

milestones.title: v2.0.0 - Mainnet Preparation
milestones.description: Security audit, mainnet configuration, and production readiness

milestones.title: v2.1.0 - Mainnet Launch
milestones.description: Phased mainnet launch with soft launch, beta, and full public release
